name: LFCD
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
LFCD, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.preprocess, interface: LFCD).
Performs degree centrality on a dataset using a given maskfile via the 3dLFCD command
For complete details, see the `3dLFCD Documentation. <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dLFCD.html>`_

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Autoclip
inputs.description: A boolean. Clip off low-intensity regions in the dataset.

inputs.name: Automask
inputs.description: A boolean. Mask the dataset to target brain-only voxels.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str' and with values which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input file to 3dlfcd.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Mask file to mask input data.

inputs.name: Num threads
inputs.description: An integer. Set number of threads.

inputs.name: Thresh
inputs.description: A float. Threshold to exclude connections where corr <= thresh.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output image file name.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file.
